scripts.clone:
git clone git@github.com:chourcade/core-app.git;git clone git@github.com:chourcade/playground-app.git;git clone git@github.com:chourcade/login-app.git;echo  '
 
 NODE 18.16.0 IS REQUIRED  
  
'
scripts.installAll: cd core-app/; npm install;cd ../login-app/; npm install; cd ../playground-app/;npm install;
scripts.start: concurrently "cd core-app && npm run dev;" "cd login-app && npm run dev;" "cd playground-app && npm run dev";
